title: nANamA unakku
sahitya:
nANamA unakku nANamA vEda nAthanukk-upadEsham sheidavanai ninaikka


anupallavi

  nADi varunduyaraic-cAvaDi viDum neDuvEl nAyakanai guhanaip-pADi dinam paNiya


caraNam    Uzhvinait-toDarAlE urangAda manamuNDu shUzhvinaip-payanAlE shuzhalum iDar kaNDu
pAzh vinai sheidiDavum padarAda nenjE nin vAzhvinai vaLamAkkum meipporuLaip-paNiya
